entry.title: Announcement: libcoin
entry.summary: The speaker expresses enthusiasm towards a certain idea and inquires whether it supports merged mining. However, the speaker is skeptical about the idea being chain agnostic and believes that implementing a chain with demurrage requires changing coinWallet instead of just creating an implementation of the Chain interface. Despite this, the speaker finds that the idea will make their task easier and thanks the person for it. The speaker also offers a bounty of 7.3 btc to anyone interested in coding it.
